name: RACING CHAMPIONSHIP 3D
description:
You have to go as fast as you can while following the given course and win the race!

There are six different cars. Win races, earn virtual money and unlock all of them.

There are 25 races at five different cities: Roma, Paris, Switzerland, Norway and Romania.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive cool racing game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
